channel.title: 317 PI making a item appear when searching boxes
channel.description:
ok i want an item to show up in inventory after searching crates or any object.
someone assist please?

item.title: 317 PI making a item appear when searching boxes
item.dc:creator: @Zarpor Zarpor
item.description:
@Zarpor wrote:

Open the file actionhandler.java in server.model.players

Find the id of the object you want to be searched and with the rest of the cases add in your new case.

For instance. If your objectid is 1 and you want to give 1000 coins the code would look like thisâ€¦

[code]case 1:
c.sendMessage("You found some coins!");
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000);

break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: 317 PI making a item appear when searching boxes
